question: What does RANSAC do in each iteration?

gift_source:
::MC2::
What is the main strength of RANSAC?
{
= Robustness to outliers
~ Always optimal
~ Requires no iterations
~ Requires no model
}

question: What is the main strength of RANSAC?

gift_source:
::MC3::
What is a limitation of RANSAC?
{
= May miss optimal solution if too few iterations
~ Cannot handle outliers
~ Needs no random sampling
~ Always exact
}
title: MC3
question: What is a limitation of RANSAC?

choices.text: May miss optimal solution if too few iterations
